subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|竹|聿|t1=bamboo|t2=writing brush|c1=s|c2=p|ls=psc}} – a hand holding a brush {{lang|zh|聿}}. The bamboo ({{lang|zh|竹}}) refers to the material of traditional Chinese brushes.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: {{zh-ref|Benedict (1972)}} surmises that this might be a loan from Austro-Tai into Sino-Tibetan; ''cf.'' {{cog|map-pro|*bulut||hairy filaments of certain plants, husk}} ({{cog|ceb|bulut}}).
